name: Peace Women
overview: Peace Women invade Greenham Common. Rumors have been circulating that "The Peach Women" have found a new method of penetrating Greenham Common missile base defenses. A top secret source of information has divulged to me today that the is method of entry incorporates the use of a new revolutionary mode of transport. Though very little is known of this it has been nicknamed the Cee-5 special. This vehicle assumes a very low profile making radar detection virtually impossible, its small size and maneuverability, make it a difficult target.
